titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2897) to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to extend the authorization of appropriations in such Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-327.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/1/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2897 (Federal Trade Commission funding and authorities).
